mobileResponsivenessTip: Ensure that all images and buttons are properly resized and optimized for mobile screens to improve performance.
loadingSpeedTip: Reduce image sizes and implement lazy loading for better performance on mobile and desktop devices.
seoOptimizationTip: Add more keyword-rich content in headings and meta descriptions to increase visibility in search engines.
userExperienceTip: Simplify the navigation menu and reduce the number of clicks needed to reach the booking section for smoother user flow.
tips: Improve mobile responsiveness to ensure a smooth experience across all devices.
Optimize loading speed by compressing images and using modern file formats.
Enhance SEO by focusing on local SEO practices and incorporating relevant keywords.
